channel.description: Week 7 Announcements This Week Mon: Milestone 5 Next Mon: Week 7 & 8 Lessons Next Fri: Milestone 6 Week 7 & 8 Single Sign-On CAS Authentication ASP.NET MVC React Milestone 6 Fulfilling Requests User Roles User Management Create New Boxes Aesthetics & Usability 200 Points Aesthetics & Usability Consistent Look & Feel Minimize "Clicks" Smart Routing Helpful Labels & Errors Iconography Navigation & Context Hover Animations Keep in Touch!
